title: RT News - October 14, 2019 (17:00 MSK)
text: President Putin meets with Saudi Arabia's leadership on a highly anticipated state visit, his first to the gulf monarchy since 2007. We are there too following events. Video obtained by RTs' Ruptly agency shows the Syrian army entering Al-Hasakah province in north-east Syria. Earlier Kurdish officials said they'd struck an agreement with Damascus to deploy government troops to the area. Meantime, fears of a potential terrorist resurgence are growing Kurdish officials say a Turkish bombardment led to hundreds of relatives of foreign ISIL members fleeing a prison compound with Turkey dubbing the claims 'disinformation'.
description: President Putin meets with Saudi Arabia's leadership on a highly anticipated state visit, his first to the gulf monarchy since 2007
